name: Fast end-to-end path CRUD
description:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
  as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.
descriptionHtml:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
And I have some unique data of a book
When I add a new book to the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1881293348, title=The Little Foxes, description=Nemo corrupti et., pageCount=231, excerpt=Sit officiis impedit sit laudantium aliquid. Quia laudantium et ut ratione ab. Earum quidem sapiente consequatur non reiciendis ut. Quisquam exercitationem nemo placeat voluptates est. Facilis ut nihil rerum laborum., publishDate=2025-09-22T06:35:17.393248800Z]

steps.name: Then the book is visible in the list and in its details

steps.name: When I edit selected information of that book
Then the changes are visible in the book details
When I remove that book from the bookstore
Then I should see that the book is no longer available to users
